headline: Assurant Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.88 per Common Share
summary: ATLANTA, January 29, 2026--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.88 per share of common stock. The dividend will be payable on March 30, 2026 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on February 17, 2026.

headline: 4 Insurers Poised to Outperform Estimates This Earnings Season
summary: Solid retention, renewals, prudent pricing, exposure growth, and improved digitization are expected to help CB, CNA, AIZ, and SLF outperform fourth-quarter estimates.

headline: Can Allstate Beat Q4 Earnings on Property-Liability Strength?
summary: ALL heads into Q4 earnings with expectations for strong property-liability underwriting gains and higher premiums that could drive another earnings beat.
